T02D3602:227b-1: aushn'i sha bi dza y'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3602:227b-3: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3602:227b-4: 'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3602:227b-5: bsam gtan ma chags 'gro la mnyes //
T02D3602:227b-7: / rang nyid sgrub thabs dran bya'i phyir //
T02D3602:227b-8: rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs bshad //
T02D3602:227b-10: phyogs 'ga' zhig tu gnas nas ni //
T02D3602:227b-11: shin tu 'jam pa'i stan la 'dug / rnal 'byor bsam bya bsam par bya //
T02D3602:227b-12: sems can rnams kyi bde 'byung ba //
T02D3602:227b-14: sangs rgyas rnams ni gsal byas nas //
T02D3602:227b-15: dus gsum gshegs rnams mchod par bya //
T02D3602:227b-16: mchod cing de rnams mdun du ni //
T02D3602:227b-17: lus sogs las skyes sdig pa rnams //
T02D3602:227b-18: bgyid stsal dbye bas yang dag skyes //
T02D3602:227b-19: man ngag rig pas thams cad bshags //
T02D3602:227b-20: de la byung ba rnam par sbyang //
T02D3602:227b-21: dge ba kun la rjes yi rang //
T02D3602:227b-22: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song nas //
T02D3602:227b-23: spros pa dang bcas rim pa bzhin //
T02D3602:227b-24: man ngag gis ni brtan byas nas //
T02D3602:227b-25: ji srid byang chub bar du bsgrub //
T02D3602:227b-26: brtse bas sems can rnams la dmigs //
T02D3602:227b-27: byang chub sems nyid bsgom par bya //
T02D3602:227b-28: mtshan med dmigs pa med pa yi //
T02D3602:227b-29: rang bzhin med pa mkha' dbyings bzhin //
T02D3602:227b-30: de la aa yig las byung ba'i //
T02D3602:227b-31: chu skyes la gnas zla dkyil la ;
T02D3602:227b-32: / sa bon las byung lha mo ni //
T02D3602:227b-33: zhal gsum so sor spyan gsum pa //
T02D3602:227b-34: lang tsho gzhon zhing phun sum tshogs //
T02D3602:227b-35: sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan //
T02D3602:227b-36: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan gang //
T02D3602:227b-37: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D3602:227b-38: 'od zer dang ldan na bza' ni //
T02D3602:227b-39: ston ka'i zla ba dang mtshungs pa //
T02D3602:227b-40: rje bu n'a da'i gser mdog can //
T02D3602:227b-41: g-yas pa'i zhal ni zhi ba'o //
T02D3602:227b-43: 'jigs shing mi bzad g-yon pa'i zhal //
T02D3602:227b-44: phyag g-yas nyid kyi thugs kar ni //
T02D3602:228a-2: gnyis pa chu skyes steng gnas pa'i //
T02D3602:228a-3: sangs rgyas dang ni gsum par mda' //
T02D3602:228a-4: mchog sbyin phyag rgya bzhi pa'o //
T02D3602:228a-5: g-yon na go rims ji bzhin du //
T02D3602:228a-6: sdigs mdzub dang bcas zhags pa dang //
T02D3602:228a-7: gzhu dang de bzhin mi 'jigs pa //
T02D3602:228a-8: bum pa gang ba bsnams pa ni //
T02D3602:228a-9: mchod rten nang bzhugs bsgom par bya //
T02D3602:228a-10: snying gar sa bon dang bcas pa'i //
T02D3602:228a-11: padma bsam bya de steng du //
T02D3602:228a-12: 'od zer dkar po'i dra ba yis //
T02D3602:228a-13: bsbul [*bskul?] zhing gdan drangs nam mkha' la //
T02D3602:228a-14: sangs rgyas sprin tshogs chen po dang //
T02D3602:228a-15: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dag 'khod ;
T02D3602:228a-16: / brtse chen bdag nyid de rnams kyang //
T02D3602:228a-17: rang rgyud dus gsum 'khor bar bsam //
T02D3602:228a-18: dbang bskur rab tu sbyin par mdzad //
T02D3602:228a-19: 'bad pas rtag tu bsam par bya //
T02D3602:228a-20: mchod rten nang bzhugs aom dang tr'am //
T02D3602:228a-23: sa bon las skyes go rim pa bzhin //
T02D3602:228a-24: spyi bo dpral ba mgrin pa'i gnas //
T02D3602:228a-25: snying ga lte ba rkang pa'i gnas //
T02D3602:228a-26: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D3602:228a-28: ston ka'i zla 'od dang mtshungs pa //
T02D3602:228a-30: chu skyes rdo rje dag las byung ;
T02D3602:228a-31: / g-yas pa dag gis rnga yab bsnams //
T02D3602:228a-32: padma rdo rje 'dzin pa dag / de yi g-yas g-yon logs su'o //
T02D3602:228a-33: mdun du mi g-yo ba dang ni //
T02D3602:228a-34: 'dod pa'i rgyal po g-yas phyogs su //
T02D3602:228a-35: rgyab kyi phyogs su dbyug sngon can //
T02D3602:228a-36: g-yon du stobs chen dgod par bya //
T02D3602:228a-37: ral gri lcags kyu dbyug pa dang ;
T02D3602:228a-38: / rdo rje rnams ni phyag na bsnams //
T02D3602:228a-39: glog bcas rdo rje ltung bzhin pa'i //
T02D3602:228a-40: dus mtha'i chu 'dzin dang mtshungs pa //
T02D3602:228a-41: spyan ni sos ka'i nyi 'od bzhin //
T02D3602:228a-42: gdug pa rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed //
T02D3602:228a-43: kun gyi phyag g-yon rnams na ni //
T02D3602:228a-44: sdigs mdzub dang bcas zhags pa bsnams //
T02D3602:228a-46: sna tshogs padma nyi dkyil bzhugs //
T02D3602:228a-47: sngags pas nyin dang mtshan mo ru //
T02D3602:228a-49: rdo rje'i theg par rab zhugs nas //
T02D3602:228a-50: de yis myur du byang chub 'thob //
